Class OrdersPlacedController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4rupizzeria.OrdersPlacedController
public class OrdersPlacedController extends Object
This class is meant to manage all the event handling in the OrdersPlaced interface. It allows the user to cancel orders or export them into a file that they can save on their device.

  • Constructor Details

    • OrdersPlacedController

      public OrdersPlacedController()

  • Method Details

    • cancelOrder

      void cancelOrder()
      Removes the order number option from the ComboBox and the order from the list of orders. Updates the orderNumberBox and displays the first order in the list.

    • exportOrder

      void exportOrder()
      Exports all the orders into a text file displaying the order number and pizzas ordered for each order. If there are no orders, an alert is displayed, telling the user to place an order to export.

    • createAlert

      private void createAlert(String title, String header, String content)
      Creates a pop-up window alert that informs the user of any important action they should take.
      Parameters:
      title - - the title of the alert shown on the window.
      header - - the main error/update conveyed to the user.
      content - - the information about the alert, giving instructions or describing the alert.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes all the events and controllers in the scene, displaying the proper information.

    • displayDefault

      public void displayDefault()
      Displays the default information for all textfields, listview, and combobox.

    • fillOrderNumberBox

      private void fillOrderNumberBox()
      Fills and updates the orderNumberBox with all the order numbers for all the orders.

    • displayOrderTotal

      private void displayOrderTotal()
      Displays the correct total price of the order for the associated chosen order number.

    • displayOrder

      private void displayOrder()
      Displays the full list of pizzas in the order for the associated chosen order number.

    • generatePizzaDescriptions

      private ArrayList<String> generatePizzaDescriptions(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Pizza> pizzas)
      Generates the correct description for the particular pizza. This discription includes the cost (rounded up to 2 decimal places), the type, the size, tbe crust, and all the toppings.
      Parameters:
      pizzas - - the list of Pizza objects to generate descriptions for.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of Strings of pizza descriptions.

    • findOrder

      private Order findOrder(int number)
      Finds the correct order in the orders ArrayList given the order number. Returns a null object otherwise.
      Parameters:
      number - - the order number
      Returns:
      the found Order object.

    • backToMenu

      void backToMenu(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws IOException
      Allows the user to return back to the main menu when the button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - - the event of the mouse being clicked
      Throws:
      IOException - - input/output exception when the proper file isn't received.
